content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand you want to rent an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Considering it's a newly built apartment and its central location, I think 900 Euros per month would be a fair price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a fair starting point, Farhad Abbasi. I appreciate your understanding of the value of my apartment. I'll consider your offer and get back to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's negotiate. How about 850 Euros? I believe the price could be lower considering the current market situation and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your perspective, Farhad Abbasi, but I must disagree. Considering the prime location of the apartment and its new construction, I think 950 Euros per month would be a more suitable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I have to disagree again. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current market situation, I propose 800 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your persistence, Farhad Abbasi, but I must stand firm. Considering the prime location of the apartment and its new construction, I insist on 975 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your firmness, but I have to stand by my proposal. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current market situation, I propose 775 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Farhad Abbasi, but I must decline. Considering the prime location of the apartment and its new construction, I insist on 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your persistence, but I have to stand by my proposal. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current market situation, I propose 750 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Farhad Abbasi, but I must decline. Considering the prime location of the apartment and its new construction, I insist on 1050 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
